SEARCH
Package linkia.dam.whatacookrecipes.service.repository

Interface RecipeDao

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.reactive.ReactiveCrudRepository<RecipeDto,String>, org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.ReactiveMongoRepository<RecipeDto,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.ReactiveQueryByExampleExecutor<RecipeDto>, org.springframework.data.repository.reactive.ReactiveSortingRepository<RecipeDto,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<RecipeDto,String>
@Repository public interface RecipeDao extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.ReactiveMongoRepository<RecipeDto,String>
Repository interface for managing RecipeDto entities. Extends the ReactiveMongoRepository to provide reactive CRUD operations.

Methods: - findByNameContainingIgnoreCase(String name): Finds recipes with names containing the specified string, case insensitive. - findByNameIgnoreCase(String name): Finds a recipe by name, case insensitive. - findByIngredientsNameIn(List ingredientNames): Finds recipes containing any of the specified ingredient names. - findByAllIngredientsNameIn(List ingredientNames): Finds recipes containing all of the specified ingredient names.

Annotations: - @Repository: Indicates that this interface is a Spring Data Repository. - @Query: Custom query for finding recipes by ingredient names.

See Also:
  • ReactiveMongoRepository

    • findByIngredientsNameIn

      Finds recipes containing any of the specified ingredient names.
      Parameters:
      ingredientNames - A list of ingredient names to search for within recipes.

      Finds recipes containing all of the specified ingredient names.
